People have never believed that the three of us could run the company as a triumvirate, but[ this is] a very, very well-managed business. The three of us will be on all of the big decisions together. Changes at the top of Google are ultimately tactical matters. When he looks ahead a decade or more, Eric Schmidt knows that he is standing on the cusp of the next big shift in technological innovation.
